What I do / my purpose:
- Help you with questions about Mitsolab products, plans, pricing, and features.
- Guide you through account issues (billing, plan changes, storage/message limits), setup, and basic troubleshooting.
- Provide product information, explain differences between plans (e.g., monthly vs yearly, storage and message limits), and point you to documentation or next steps.
- Escalate or direct you to human support when needed.

What I can help with right now:
- Explain plans and pricing
- Check or clarify account limits (messages, storage)
- Walk through billing or subscription changes
- Give setup or usage guidance
- Answer product-feature questions

I can’t perform certain sensitive actions directly (like changing account passwords) myself, but I can tell you exactly how to do them or initiate support escalation.

What would you like help with today?"}],"role":"assistant"}],"parallel_tool_calls":true,"presence_penalty":0,"previous_response_id":null,"prompt_cache_key":null,"prompt_cache_retention":null,"reasoning":{"effort":"low","summary":null},"safety_identifier":null,"service_tier":"default","store":true,"temperature":1,"text":{"format":{"type":"text"},"verbosity":"medium"},"tool_choice":"auto","tools":[{"type":"function","description":"Use when the customer wants to know about the bathroom status if empty or not.","name":"get_bathroom_status","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"who_am_i":{"type":"string"},"nu1":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"n1":{"type":"string"},"n2":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["n1","n2"],"additionalProperties":false},"minItems":1},"nu2":{"type":"number"}},"required":["who_am_i","nu1","nu2"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}],"top_logprobs":0,"top_p":1,"truncation":"disabled","usage":{"input_tokens":1221,"input_tokens_details":{"cached_tokens":0},"output_tokens":246,"output_tokens_details":{"reasoning_tokens":0},"total_tokens":1467},"user":null,"metadata":{}}
